text: In this post, we'll walk you through setting up user authentication and authorization
in a NestJS application using Firebase Auth.
Discover how to build an app where users can sign up and sign in with different roles,
accessing specific endpoints based on permissions.
We'll guide you through installing the necessary tools, configuring Nest with Firebase Auth,
and setting up authentication guards for protected routes.
This is a comprehensive guide to integrating a robust authentication system
To dive deeper, read more below.
